title: Was the Mandalai Bay Hotel in Las Vegas Swing victims of mass shooting?
subtitle: MGM International, the parent company in Mandalay Bay, claims not to be responsible for the harvest festival massacre on Route 91 in 2017.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: :: Mandalay Bay, Las Vegas Hotel, from which an armed man shot a crowd of 20,000 concerts, sued the victims of mass shooting.
